welcome.title: Welcome to Budget Tracker
welcome.greeting: Hi {{name}}! We're excited to help you take control of your finances. Budget Tracker makes it easy to track your spending, set budgets, and achieve your financial goals.
welcome.tour: Let's take a quick tour to help you get started.
welcome.transactions.title: Track Your Transactions
welcome.transactions.description: Start by adding your income and expenses in the Transactions section. You can categorize them and add tags for better organization.
welcome.transactions.shortcut: Use keyboard shortcut {{key}} to quickly add a new transaction.
welcome.budgets.title: Set Budgets & Goals
welcome.budgets.description: Create monthly budgets for different categories to manage your spending. Set financial goals like saving for a vacation or building an emergency fund.
welcome.budgets.budgetsDescription: Track spending against your monthly limits
welcome.budgets.goalsDescription: Save for future purchases and dreams
welcome.bills.title: Manage Bills & Get Insights
welcome.bills.description: Keep track of your recurring bills and subscriptions. View detailed reports and insights about your spending habits on the Dashboard.
welcome.bills.reminder: Never miss a payment again with bill reminders and due date tracking.
welcome.bills.ready: You're all set to start your financial journey with Budget Tracker!
